articles.description: Using chess pieces to help explain his complicated situation, dad-of-two Nick Davis said “the king doesn’t move around much” while the queens have all the power
articles.content:
A self-described "trophy husband" stays at home while his three wives go out and work full-time jobs.
Dad-of-two Nick Davis doesn't work as "the King doesn't move around much" while the Queens have … [+2165 chars]

articles.author: Chiara Fiorillo, Ryan Fahey
articles.title: Woman claiming to be Madeleine McCann says she has two vital pieces of 'evidence' - Edinburgh Live
articles.description: The TikTok user, @iammadeleinemcann, has gained 17,000 followers on the app and has also made an Instagram account. Despite the woman's age being 21, she says that there could be a mistake
articles.content:
A Polish woman who started an online campaign to prove that she is Madeleine McCann says she has "evidence" to back up her claims.

articles.author: Emmeline Saunders
articles.title: Sir Jackie Stewart offers to talk to Bruce Willis' family about dementia - Daily Record
articles.description: Jackie's wife Helen, 82, has had the illness since 2014, and has lost the ability to walk.
articles.content:
Motor racing legend Sir Jackie Stewart, whose wife Helen has dementia, has offered to talk to Bruce Willis and his family as he understands exactly what they are going through.
